name: auto-ml
description: AutoML integration containing both the backend (Python) and frontend (TypeScript)

scripts.serve-all: concurrently 'npm run serve-api' 'cd ui && npm run start' 'rabbitmq-server' 'npm run serve-worker' 'npm run open-browser'
scripts.serve-all-local: concurrently 'cross-env NO_NETWORK_ALLOWED=true npm run serve-api' 'cd ui && npm run start-local' 'rabbitmq-server' 'npm run serve-worker' 'npm run open-browser'

author: Samer Albahra
